C

CIServer - Class in Unnamed Package
Main class of the project This class is used to start the server through its main() method This class extends AbstractHandler and provides an implementation of the handle() method to serve as a CI server
CIServer() - Constructor for class CIServer
Empty default constructor, no resource nor parameter need for instantiation
code_verification - package code_verification
 
CodeVerifier - Class in code_verification
This class provides an implementation to try to compile and to run the tests of a maven based project located at the path given to its constructor.
CodeVerifier(String) - Constructor for class code_verification.CodeVerifier
The CodeVerifier constructor makes sure the given project folder path points to a valid maven projects

D

deleteRepo(String) - Method in class server_communication.WebhookJSONAnalyser
Deletes a repo assuming it has been created using the naming convention of this project and the suitable location according to the same conventions

E

Email - Class in server_communication
This class provides an implementation to send emails to a constructor given recipient through the send() method
Email(String) - Constructor for class server_communication.Email
Class constructor stores the email recipient and sets the other communication related parameters

getTestXml() - Method in class code_verification.CodeVerifier

H

handle(String, Request, HttpServletRequest, HttpServletResponse) - Method in class CIServer
Handles incoming HTTP requests for the CI server.

M

main(String[]) - Static method in class CIServer
Main entry point to launch the CI server

R

runTests() - Method in class code_verification.CodeVerifier
Tries to run all the tests in the folder previously given to the constructor This method relies on the maven library surefire to run JUnit tests This method is intended to be run only once since the result of the tests should be deterministic

S

send(String, String) - Method in class server_communication.Email
This method will send and email to the already defined recipient containing the information given as parameters
server_communication - package server_communication
 

V

verifyCompilation() - Method in class code_verification.CodeVerifier
Tries to compile the project in the folder given to the class constructor This method is intended to be run only once since the result of the compilation should be deterministic

W

WebhookJSONAnalyser - Class in server_communication
Public class intended to fetch relevant data from JSON webhook request
WebhookJSONAnalyser(String) - Constructor for class server_communication.WebhookJSONAnalyser
Class constructor will parse the given JSON String and set its parameters to the relevant values
